item.title: History and Hauntings of Salem Guided Walking Tour
item.description: Learn about Salem’s mysterious past on this guided walking tour of the city. Follow your historian guide through Salem, listening to 400 years of history, and admire the old architecture that dates back to the early colonial period. Find out the truth about the 1692 Salem Witch Trial hysteria, which has influenced literature and pop culture. For a spookier experience, select the nighttime tour led by lantern light.

image.alt: History and Hauntings of Salem Guided Walking Tour

item.title: The Salem Night Ghost Tour
item.description: When night falls across Salem, it's the perfect time to explore the city’s spooky and sinister past on a haunted history tour. On this top-rated walk through one of America's most haunted places, follow a licensed guide along lamplit streets while listening to legends and true tales of witchcraft, murder, mayhem, and more. Visit sites related to the infamous 17th-century Salem Witch Trials, and hear about the ghostly spirits said to still rattle through the town’s historic homes and graveyards.

image.alt: The Salem Night Ghost Tour

item.title: Bewitched Walking Tour of Salem
item.description: Experience 400 years of history in just a few hours with this award-winning guided walking tour of America’s spookiest city: Salem. This tour takes you on an in-depth exploration of downtown, stopping at more than 12 historically significant locations to delve into the infamous Witch Trials. Local guides tell the stories of Salem’s witchy past with an entertaining mix of history, legend, and pop culture.

image.alt: Bewitched Walking Tour of Salem

item.title: Satanic Salem Walking Tour
item.description:
Salem history from The Satanic Temple's Salem Art Gallery!
The most unique walking tour in Salem, free of supernatural or superstitious elements. No ghost stories.
Your tour guide is an expert in occultism, witchcraft, an ordained satanic minister.
Surprisingly very family friendly, but for weird families.
Who the hell is The Satanic Temple? Watch the documentary "Hail Satan?" before booking to learn more.

image.alt: Satanic Salem Walking Tour

item.title: Mysteries and Murders of Salem Guided Night-Time Walking Tour
item.description: This murder and mystery walking tour of Salem is a great option for travelers who want a break from hearing exclusively about the history of the Salem witch trials. Mix things up by listening to tales of grisly murders and sinister ghost sightings as your guide leads you to the spookiest sights in Salem. This tour is suitable for young adults and adults. Not suitable for small children.

image.alt: Mysteries and Murders of Salem Guided Night-Time Walking Tour

item.title: The Salem Witch Walk
item.description: Unlike other Salem walking tours, this witch walking tour is led by a practicing witch, so you can learn about the history of witchcraft, as well as how it’s practiced today. Walk through the streets of Salem and learn about the dos and don'ts of modern-day witchcraft, stopping at Salem's Old Burying Point Cemetery along the way.

image.alt: The Salem Witch Walk

item.title: 2.5-Hour Salem History & Sightseeing Guided Walking Tour
item.description: Salem, Massachusetts, is known for the infamous witch trials, but that isn’t the only historical occurrence you’ll learn about during this guided walking tour. Join a guide for a deep dive into the long history of Salem from the Puritans and Patriots to the present day. You’ll stop by city landmarks including the Salem Witch Trials Memorial, the Pickering House, and the Ropes Mansion and Gardens. This tour is wheelchair and stroller accessible.

image.alt: 2.5-Hour Salem History & Sightseeing Guided Walking Tour

item.title: Salem High Speed Ferry to/from Boston
item.description:
Don’t let time determine whether to see Boston or Salem. Visit both towns with the help of a quick and comfortable catamaran. This high-speed ferry service travels from Boston to Salem (or vice versa). Enjoy the scenic adventure from the upper or lower deck of the boat—or just relax at the lounge inside. An onboard galley offers food and beverages for purchase. Upon arrival, many top attractions are within walking distance.
For Round Trip, you will need to purchase two separate one way tickets - one departing from Boston and one departing from Salem.

image.alt: Salem High Speed Ferry to/from Boston

item.title: Requiem for Salem Walking Ghost Tour
item.description: If you want to connect with Salem's haunted history without any of the fluff or gimmicks, hear the stories right where they all happened on this adults-only ghost tour. Guides don't shy away from the chilling details of dark deeds and paranormal activity at Salem's most haunted locations, from the Old Burying Point Cemetery to the House of Seven Gables and Proctor's Ledge, where the infamous witch trial hangings most likely took place.

image.alt: Requiem for Salem Walking Ghost Tour

item.title: Wicked Awesome Tours: Witch Trial History and Salem Haunts!
item.description: Learn the true history of the Salem Witch Trials and visit the key locations from this dark chapter in American history with this themed walking tour. Hear about the accusers and the accused as you take in the Salem Witch Trials Memorial, Burying Point, and other landmarks tied to this 17th-century scandal. Plus, visit the city’s most notorious haunted spots, filming locations for the movie “Hocus Pocus”, and other must-see local attractions.

image.alt: Wicked Awesome Tours: Witch Trial History and Salem Haunts!

item.title: Salem "Hocus Pocus" Movie Locations Tour (31st Anniversary)
item.description: Get bewitched in Salem on a walking tour of the real-life filming locations featured in the hit 1993 film “Hocus Pocus” starring Better Midler, Sarah Jessica Parker and Kathy Najimy. Fans will recognize places like Pioneer Village and the Dennison House, plus there's plenty of local insight about Salem's infamous witch trials, maritime history, and other interesting trivia along the way.

image.alt: Salem "Hocus Pocus" Movie Locations Tour (31st Anniversary)

item.title: Black Cat Historical Day Tour
item.description: If you’re a history buff visiting Salem, don’t miss out on this history-focused tour that reveals the city’s turbulent past. A costumed guide tells tales of war, witchcraft, pirates and Puritans, and reveals information that you’re unlikely to find in the guide book. This tour, which proves ideal for first-time visitors, is unscripted and can therefore be tailored according to the interests of the group.

image.alt: Black Cat Historical Day Tour

item.title: Black Cat Ghostly Night Tour in Salem
item.description: Travelers who aren’t afraid of a good spooky tale or spine-chilling experience will love this 75-minute guided evening tour of Salem. Learn all about Salem’s spooky history as you visit haunted sites, former crime scenes, and places that inspired ghost stories and literature. Your guide will keep you entertained as you walk the city at night, looking over your shoulder and jumping at your shadow along the way.

image.alt: Black Cat Ghostly Night Tour in Salem

item.title: Triple Threat Combo Pass: 3 TOURS (3:30pm, 5pm, & 7pm or 8:30pm)
item.description: If you really want to dive deep into Salem’s dark history, take a trio of fun and enlightening tours. Hear from a real practicing witch on the “Wandering Witches” tour, and follow the chilling timeline of the Salem Witch Trials on “Steps Through 1692.” Finally, finish after dark with “Salem's Spooky Spectres” — a spine-tingling walk through tales of murder and madness at the town's most haunted locations.

image.alt: Triple Threat Combo Pass: 3 TOURS (3:30pm, 5pm, & 7pm or 8:30pm)

item.title: Real Pirates Salem Museum General Admission Ticket
item.description: Discover pirate history in Salem, Massachusetts with a ticket to an interactive exhibition. Learn about the real-life stories of pirates as you explore the exhibit at your own pace. Listen to an audio guide as you see pirate treasure including coins and jewelry, retrieved from a shipwreck. Check out the discovery lab and immerse yourself in the history of pirates off the coast of Cape Cod.

image.alt: Real Pirates Salem Museum General Admission Ticket

item.title: 1692 Salem Night Walking Tour
item.description:
Take a journey through 400 years of history with a local historian and real-life Witch as your guide. Uncover the secrets of Witch City as we dive deep into the events surrounding the 1692 Salem Witch Trial.
Are you ready to unlock the secrets of one of the darkest chapters in American history? Look no further than our immersive Salem Witch Trial Tour.
We are beloved by tourists and Locals alike. With so many tours to choose from, look no further, do yourself a favor and book this tour!
As you walk through Salem to visit historical sites, you will hear a jaw-dropping story covering Salem before the trials, what caused the witch hysteria, who were the judges and accusers, how residents responded to the accusations, who were the 20 victims, and how it all ended.
HIGHLIGHTS: • Family Owned and Operated • Seasons storyteller and Local Historians with 10+ years of experience • Learn 400 years of Salem's rich history in one tour • Loved by locals and tourists alike!

image.alt: 1692 Salem Night Walking Tour

item.title: 1692 Salem Day Tour
item.description:
Take a journey through 400 years of history with a local historian and real-life Witch as your guide. Uncover the secrets of Witch City as we dive deep into the events surrounding the 1692 Salem Witch Trial.
Are you ready to unlock the secrets of one of the darkest chapters in American history? Look no further than our immersive Salem Witch Trial Tour.
We are beloved by tourists and Locals alike. With so many tours to choose from, look no further, do yourself a favor and book this tour!
As you walk through Salem to visit historical sites, you will hear a jaw-dropping story covering Salem before the trials, what caused the witch hysteria, who were the judges and accusers, how residents responded to the accusations, who were the 20 victims, and how it all ended.
HIGHLIGHTS: • Family Owned and Operated • Seasons storyteller and Local Historians with 10+ years of experience • Learn 400 years of Salem's rich history in one tour • Loved by locals and tourists alike!

image.alt: 1692 Salem Day Tour

item.title: Sailing on Historic Schooner Yacht in Salem, MA
item.description: Set sail at along the Massachusetts' North Shore, during your visit to Salem. Board the historic schooner yacht What and If and drift along the coastline, taking in the sights of Salem. Relax on the deck or take a turn at the wheel of this beautifully restored classic sailing yacht, which was built in 1939 by General George Patton. Soft drinks and bottled water are provided, and a cash bar is available on board.

image.alt: Sailing on Historic Schooner Yacht in Salem, MA

item.title: Witch Costume Photo Shoot - Olde Salem Village theatrical set
item.description: Capture your inner mystic on a witch-themed photo shoot in Salem. Choose from among 300 different witch and wizard costumes to suit your personal supernatural style, and pose against a 3-dimensional backdrop designed to mimic the Olde Salem Village of 1692. An in-house stylist and professional photographer help you look your bewitching best and capture several different poses.

image.alt: Witch Costume Photo Shoot - Olde Salem Village theatrical set

item.title: Salem Booze and Brews Haunted Pub Crawl by US Ghost Adventures
item.description: Explore the best of Salem’s nightlife scene while delving into its notorious spooky history. Visit a range of cozy taverns and trendy cocktail bars, hearing chilling accounts of local witchcraft and on-site hauntings. Make stops at eerie landmarks in between for added thrill.

image.alt: Salem Booze and Brews Haunted Pub Crawl by US Ghost Adventures

item.title: Witch Costume Photo Shoot - Witch Cottage theatrical set
item.description: Immortalize your Salem vacation with a spooky set of photographs from Witch Cottage, a spellbinding set that features potions, spell books, and an altar adorned with tools for spell-casting and rituals. During this private session, you’ll dress up in a witch costume chosen by a personal stylist and benefit from the undivided attention of a personal photographer.

image.alt: Witch Costume Photo Shoot - Witch Cottage theatrical set

item.title: Salem Kids Slightly Spooky Tour
item.description: Get to know Salem’s haunted history with a slightly spooky sightseeing tour designed for kids ages six and up. Listen to a mix of ghost stories and historic anecdotes during this walking tour that includes popular Salem landmarks such as Broad Street Cemetery, the First Church in Salem, and Ropes Mansion and Garden. Combine education and fun with this tour for kids.

image.alt: Salem Kids Slightly Spooky Tour

item.title: Salem's Spooky Spectres Walking Ghost Tour
item.description: See Salem’s spookiest spots on this 90-minute guided walking tour. Hit historic scary sites around town such as the Old Salem Gaol, Phillips Library, Pickman House, Old Burying Point, Joshua Ward House, Wicked Good Books, and the Lyceum as you listen to witchy stories of Salem’s past.

image.alt: Salem's Spooky Spectres Walking Ghost Tour

item.title: Salem On Foot Walking Tours
item.description: Get a more intimate glimpse into Salem during a guided walking tour that focuses on the dark history of the city. Without having to worry about checking maps or getting lost, you’ll navigate the city streets with ease and listen to historical commentary that you’re unlikely to find in the guide books. Plus, you can choose from a morning, afternoon, or evening departure time.

image.alt: Salem On Foot Walking Tours
